title: Watch: 11-Year-Old King Shoots Home Intruder, Mocks the Intruder  for Crying After He was Shot (Updated)
description:
EDIT: Okay, so apparently this clip is from 2016. The dude is still a legend.

We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website love ourselves a quality good guy with a gun story. Chris Gaither, 11, is the goodest guy with a gun we've ever heard of. A nogoodnik tried breaking into Gaither's house. Chris warned the intruder that he was going to kill him with a gun if the guy didn't leave. The intruder didn't listen. Chris is a kid of his word. He opened fire, and made the guy cry like a little bitch.

What sells it is how this ice-cold little man is sharing his story with the reporter. Arn Anderson with

title: Chicago Teachers Union President Busted Sending Son To Private School, Makes Hypocritical Excuses After Backlash
description:
VOTE IN THE LWC 2024 GOP STRAW POLL! CLICK HERE!

Another anti-school choice democrat was caught once again sending her kid to public school after she actively campaigned against it in spite of your kids.

The president of the Chicago Teachers Union (CTU) is defending her decision to send her freshman son to a Catholic school on the South Side of Chicago after facing backlash for the decision.

title: Watch: The shrill harpies from The View validate everything conservatives have said about leftists and illegal immigration
description:
VOTE IN THE LWC 2024 GOP STRAW POLL! CLICK HERE!

Not all of the unsung heroes in conservatism get their roses. We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website would like to salute Newsbusters's Nicholas Fondacaro. He watches The View so that we don't have to, and only need to check his clips to see what those shrill harpies are yakking about. The View falls under the ABC "NEWS" division, so what they say... I guess matters? On Friday, they all agreed with Ann Coulter that illegal immigration is a problem.

— (@)
